decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent. Reason: As required by Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Site Location Plan, CA013 - Proposed South Elevation, CA014 - Proposed Side Elevation, CA016 - Proposed North Elevation, CA017 - Proposed Elevation Ends North, Heritage, Design and Access Statement, dated 14 April 2021, Heritage Statement (Water Cleaning Method Statement), dated 27 July 2021 and Photographic Schedule, dated 28 March 2021.Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The method of repointing hereby approved as part of this permission shall be traditionally undertaken by hand methods only, using a lime mortar tinted to a matching colour to that as existing. Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic interest of this Listed Building is safeguarded.

The method of cleaning of the brickwork hereby approved as part of this permission shall be via water cleaning only and not by the use of chemicals, pressure or mechanical methods, and shall be carried out in full accordance with the water wash cleaning Method Statement, dated 27th July 2021.  Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic interest of this Listed Building is safeguarded.
